Pomodoro technique is a time management method that asks you to alternate pomodoros — focused work sessions — with frequent short breaks to promote sustained concentration and stave off mental fatigue (being \"Pomodoro\" the italian word for \"tomato\" -yeah that explains the design!!!)

1) Pick a task
2) Set a duration for the Focused Timer
3) Work on the task until the time is up
4) Take a short break
5) Every four pomodoros (four cycles), take a longer break
